createWithDeltas(address,address,(addres.details: Requirements: - There must be at least one element in `batch`. - All requirements from {ISablierV2LockupDynamic.createWithDeltas} must be met for each stream.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset used for streaming.
params.batch: An array of structs, each encapsulating a subset of the parameters of {SablierV2LockupDynamic.createWithDeltas}.

returns.streamIds: The ids of the newly created streams.

createWithDurations(address,address,(add.details: Requirements: - There must be at least one element in `batch`. - All requirements from {ISablierV2LockupLinear.createWithDurations} must be met for each stream.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset used for streaming.
params.batch: An array of structs, each encapsulating a subset of the parameters of {SablierV2LockupLinear.createWithDurations}.

returns.streamIds: The ids of the newly created streams.

createWithMilestones(address,address,(ad.details: Requirements: - There must be at least one element in `batch`. - All requirements from {ISablierV2LockupDynamic.createWithMilestones} must be met for each stream.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset used for streaming.
params.batch: An array of structs, each encapsulating a subset of the parameters of {SablierV2LockupDynamic.createWithMilestones}.

returns.streamIds: The ids of the newly created streams.

createWithRange(address,address,(address.details: Requirements: - There must be at least one element in `batch`. - All requirements from {ISablierV2LockupLinear.createWithRange} must be met for each stream.

params.asset: The contract address of the ERC-20 asset used for streaming.
params.batch: An array of structs, each encapsulating a subset of the parameters of {SablierV2LockupLinear.createWithRange}.

returns.streamIds: The ids of the newly created streams.

createWithDeltas(address,address,(addres.notice: Creates a batch of Lockup Dynamic streams using `createWithDeltas`.

createWithDurations(address,address,(add.notice: Creates a batch of Lockup Linear streams using `createWithDurations`.

createWithMilestones(address,address,(ad.notice: Creates a batch of Lockup Dynamic streams using `createWithMilestones`.

createWithRange(address,address,(address.notice: Creates a batch of Lockup Linear streams using `createWithRange`.

documentation.text:
@dev Helper function to approve a Sablier contract to spend funds from the batch. If the current allowance
 is insufficient, this function approves Sablier to spend the exact `amount`.
 The {SafeERC20.forceApprove} function is used to handle special ERC-20 assets (e.g. USDT) that require the
 current allowance to be zero before setting it to a non-zero value.
@dev Helper function to transfer assets from the caller to the batch contract and approve the Sablier contract.
